name: yolk
description: A library for building asynchronous user interfaces.
author: Gabe Scholz

scripts.bundle: browserify -s Yolk -u rx src/yolk.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim -d | exorcist dist/yolk.js.map > dist/yolk.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib/ dist/ && mkdir lib/ dist/
scripts.commit-bundle: git add dist/ lib/ && git commit -m ':tada: new bundle!'
scripts.prerelease: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run uglify && npm run build && npm run commit-bundle
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-chrome && npm run test-firefox
scripts.test-phantom: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./src browserify test/**/*-test.js -t babelify --noparse=rx | tape-run --browser=phantom | faucet
scripts.test-firefox: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./src browserify test/**/*-test.js -t babelify --noparse=rx | tape-run --browser=firefox | faucet
scripts.test-chrome: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./src browserify test/**/*-test.js -t babelify --noparse=rx | tape-run --browser=chrome | faucet
scripts.test-safari: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./src browserify test/**/*-test.js -t babelify --noparse=rx | tape-run --browser=safari | faucet
